title: The minimum headroom in a passage under the landing of a staircase shall be 2
clause_text: The minimum headroom in a passage under the landing of a staircase shall be 2.2 m. No living space, store or other space including fire risk shall open directly into the staircase.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum headroom in a passage under the landing of a staircase shall be 2.2 m.
